name: HighGarden
description:
Greetings everyone! My name is Matei Bogdan (a.k.a HalfOrange), I'm an 18 years old male developer(wanna be) from Romania. A friend told me about Unity and I thought of giving it a shot. I started working in Unity(and in C#) 5 days ago, and managed to develop a game based on the first tutorial on Unity Learn section (Roll-A-Ball). I have long ways to go but I hope you'll enjoy my short game(it was one of the most exciting this I ever did and for sure will continue creating/developing).

Please give me your feedback on my first game(critics are most welcome)!

Until the next game!
